schema.name: License Issue Date	License Number	Animal's Name	Species	Primary Breed	Secondary Breed	ZIP Code

properties.description: adf to access my storage containers
access my key vault from azure data factory
linking the stgblobstorage2025 to the DF

scriptLines: query: 'select NVL(MAX(BREED_SK),0) as MaxBreedSK FROM TMEMP_SCHEMA.BREED_DIM',
readTSVfile derive(LIC_ISSUE_DATE = toDate({License Issue Date}, 'MMMM dd yyyy'),
query: 'select NVL(MAX(PET_LICENSE_SK),0) as MaxPetLICSK FROM TMEMP_SCHEMA.PET_LICENSES_FACT',
